ValidationRule.description: PBI: 3566677. This validation restrict Contact Cases to be assigned to SRC queues.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.UPSD_Bypass_Validation_Rules_Triggers__c.Bypass_Case_Validation_rules__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CEC_Case', ISCHANGED(OwnerId), CEC_Updated_from_IWT__c = false, NOT($Profile.Name == 'System Administrator'), NOT($Profile.Name = 'UPS CEC Admin'), CONTAINS(CEC_Original_Queue_Name__c, 'CEC'), CONTAINS(CEC_Original_Queue_Name__c, 'SRC') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cases cannot be assigned to this queue or user.
